title: Australian shares fall as consumer, tech losses outweigh commodity gains
description: Australian shares closed slightly lower on Wednesday as the technology and consumer stocks declined. Energy and mining stocks outperformed, driven by rising commodity prices.
content: Australian shares closed slightly lower on Wednesday, as losses in consumer-focussed and technology sectors outweighed gains in energy and mining stocks, while Iran's ballistic missile strike on Israel stoked fears of a wider conflict in the Middle East.
cleaned_content: australian shares closed slightly lower on wednesday as losses in consumer focussed and technology sectors outweighed gains in energy and mining stocks while irans ballistic missile strike on israel stoked fears of a wider conflict in the middle east
